# [L1:core] Core Domain

## Purpose

Provides core functionality for the test system.

## Entry Points

| Entry Point | Description |
|-------------|-------------|
| [`example_function`](../../sample_code/src/example.py#L4) | Top-level function |
| [`ExampleClass`](../../sample_code/src/example.py#L9) | Main class |

## Depends On

None - this is a standalone module.
